attributes.action: To designate the minimum rashers of bacon in a standard bacon sandwich to four.
attributes.additional_details:
Because the world is full of bad stuff. A brimming bacon sandwich is good stuff. 
The human race deserves good stuff
attributes.background: I want the government to agree that a bacon sandwich should be substantial as standard. If anybody wants less bacon then they stipulate this at the point of sale.

rejection.details: We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.
